page.title: 13Marconi in Chelmsford (1)
page.content: The{Marconi company,}founded in 1897 in London,and established at{Hall {Street}in Chelmsford in{1899}(the first electrical equipment in the world),now manufactures a very wide range of{electronic equipment.}This includes{broadcast sound and tele- {vision}studio transmitting equipment, outside broadcast units, aerial equipment,Microwave multichannel transmit/receive equipment,{Space {communications equipment, Naval, {military and air force communication {equipment,}Digital and computer systems and Mobile Radio systems. The above are made by Marconi communications Systems Ltd (MCSL).
